price: Para quienes no creen en su Señor les tengo preparado el castigo del Infierno. ¡Qué pésimo destino!
arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walilladhīna kafarū birabbihim ʿadhābu jahannama wabi'sa al-maṣīru
